title: State Worshipping Ceremony for the Mount Bogdkhan Held (President of Mongolia)
text: ( Source : President of Mongolia ) Upon the Decree of the President of Mongolia, the state worshipping ceremony of the Mount Bogdkhan was held on October 7, 2015 . At the ceremony, President of Mongolia Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj , Chief of Staff of
